resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Welcome to Loops! Interact with a tone matrix to edit, save, and share loops generated live on your phone.
To get started, go to the Loop Editor and tap the grid, then hit play! To change the dimension of the grid and the duration of tones, use the buttons to the side.
